sentences.en: A farmer is entitled to a certain particularized tax treatment.
sentences.cn: 农民能够得到某种具体的税收待遇。

sentences.en: I feel certain that it will all turn out well.
sentences.cn: 我觉得最后肯定会皆大欢喜。

sentences.en: I felt certain that I’d passed the test.
sentences.cn: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.en: It wasn't a balloon — I'm certain of that.
sentences.cn: 那不是气球，这点我敢肯定。

sentences.en: Kenworthy detected a certain flatness in the days that followed.
sentences.cn: 肯沃西在接下来的几天中感到有些平淡无趣。

sentences.en: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

sentences.en: Mr King seems certain to be pressed for further details.
sentences.cn: 看来人们一定会竭力要求金先生提供进一步的细节。

sentences.en: Nothing seems certain in this crucial period in Pakistan's political life.
sentences.cn: 在巴基斯坦政治历史上的这个紧要关头,一切皆非定数.

sentences.en: Over the years he's demonstrated a certain prescience in foreign affairs.
sentences.cn: 这些年来，他已经在外交事务方面表现出一定的预见性。

sentences.en: She's absolutely certain she's going to make it in the world.
sentences.cn: 她坚信自己会出人头地。

sentences.en: The library’s only open at certain times of day.
sentences.cn: 这座图书馆只在一天的某些时段开放。

sentences.en: The stores are sometimes sold out of certain groceries.
sentences.cn: 有时商店里的某些杂货会有脱销的现象。

sentences.en: There are certain things he does that drive me mad.
sentences.cn: 他的某些举动让我很生气。

sentences.en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

sentences.en: There were certain places that were really creepy at night.
sentences.cn: 有些地方晚上真是让人不寒而栗。

sentences.en: They'll have to give up completely on certain of their studies.
sentences.cn: 他们将不得不彻底放弃某些研究。

sentences.en: To a certain extent it's easier for men to get work.
sentences.cn: 在一定程度上，男性更容易找到工作。

sentences.en: You owe a certain person a sum of money.

phrases.tran_cn: （采取行动）确保（某事发生）；查实（某事），查明（某事属实）

trans.tran_cn: 肯定的，无疑的，轻微的，某个，某些，某位
trans.tran_en: confident and sure, without any doubts

trans.tran_cn: 某些（不提及人或事物的名称时用）
trans.tran_en: particular people or things in a group
